Text:
Is there someone who could seed this again? Started downloading it two days ago, but needed to shut my pc down this afternoon.
Right now I'm stuck at 41%.
Any help is appreciated and I'll ofcourse keep seeding it afterwards.
Thanks,
rambert66

BEWARE: JAPANESE SUBTITLES!!!!  Not just during the dialogue, bit also the song lyrics.  LARGE subtitles at that.  Extraordinarily distracting (dub is from VHS so thy can't be removed).  Picture quaity is above average compated to a lot of other VHS rips I've seen, and - most important - the audio is excellent.
